front.title: SMIng - Next Generation Structure of Management Information

abstract.t: This memo presents an object-oriented data definition language forthe specification of various kinds of management information. It isindependent of management protocols and applications. Protocolmappings are defined as extensions to this language in separatememos. The language builds on experiences gained with the SMIv2 andits derivate SPPI. It is expected that the language presented inthis memo along with its protocol mappings will replace the SMIv2and the SPPI in the long term.
